channel.title: Homes on Pavan Chennagiri
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pavan Chennagiri

item.description: Biography I am a PhD student advised by Dr. Alan Bovik in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at UT Austin. I completed my Masters (Research) in 2018, where I worked with Dr. Rajiv Soundararajan in the Department of Electrical Communication Engineering at IISc Bangalore. I primarily work in the overlapping areas of image processing, computer vision and machine learning with a strong focus on developing quality assessment techniques for various image and video applications.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Google, Mountain View, CA $\hspace{95pt}$ Summer ‘19 Research Intern, Media Algorithms Team, YouTube Mentor : Dr. Mohammad Izadi Real time video denoising of YouTube Videos Worked on real-time video denoising algorithm for user uploaded videos in YouTube. The proposed method had superior speed than existing denoiser and was employed in YouTube TV and LIVE.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Tutor - I conducted weekly tutorial classes for the following topics: Python Scripting - an introductory course for python conducted under Peer Mentoring Programme organized by ECE Department, NITK during 2015-2016. Engineering Mathematics - II (MA111) for the students of first year B. Tech programme at NITK during Jan - May 2015.
